articles.description: Lamine Yamal scores and Marcus Rashford claims an assist as holders Barcelona defeat Albacete to advance into the semi-finals of the Copa del Rey.

articles.description: England successfully defend a target of 129 to win by 12 runs against Sri Lanka in an enthralling contest, completing a 3-0 T20 series sweep.
articles.title: England cricket: Tourists sweep series against Sri Lanka in low-scoring thriller

articles.description: American downhill skier Lindsey Vonn has ruptured an anterior cruciate ligament but still hopes to compete at the Winter Olympics.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn has ruptured ACL but will compete at Winter Olympics

articles.description: Pep Guardiola has spoken passionately about children being killed and injured in conflict zones across the world, saying the footage he sees "hurts me".
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss 'hurt' by images of child victims of conflict zones

articles.description: The top 10 finishers at an event will be awarded points because the Official World Golf Rankings "recognises a number of areas where LIV does not meet the eligibility standards".
articles.title: LIV Golf awarded world ranking points by OWGR amid 'changing landscape'

articles.description: With just seven Premier League deals done on transfer deadline day, has the winter transfer window become a damp squib?
articles.title: Has the January transfer window always felt flat?

articles.title: St Mirren vs Hearts: Scottish Premiership radio commentary & live text coverage

articles.description: Harvey Elliott is one of England's most gifted young players - but neither Aston Villa or Liverpool appear to rate the midfielder.
articles.title: Aston Villa: Liverpool loanee Harvey Elliott faces uncertain future
